explanation: [0-0] On a soccer field, three players in black jerseys are standing. There's a soccer ball on the grass. Many spectators are in the stands in the distance. Below the picture, there are white subtitles "THIS MOVE BY COSTA IS FILTHY" and a vomiting emoji.

[0-9] Then a player in a black jersey kicks the soccer ball high. As the soccer ball moves forward, the camera follows, and many players in red jerseys can be seen on the field. The soccer ball flies over these players and lands near the goal. Then the picture switches to a player in a black jersey and a player in a red jersey facing each other. The player in the black jersey then lifts his left foot and kicks the soccer ball, then lands with the ball. He then kicks the ball forward. At the same time, a player in a red jersey runs over and blocks in front of the man in the black jersey. At this point, the subtitles TOO SMOOTH and a flame appear on the screen. Then the player in the black jersey runs past the player in the red jersey and continues to run forward.
